attributes.action: Hold immediate General Election to elect new Government to lead EU negotiations
attributes.additional_details:
The negotiations to leave the EU are of vital importance to the future of the UK. The leadership and nature of these negotiations are too important to be determined by the a small number of members of any one political party.
Therefore, it is imperative that the people of the UK hear from each party what is their vision for our new relationship with the EU and the rest of the world so that we can elect the Government that will deliver the right outcome for the UK.
attributes.background: We, the undersigned, call for an immediate General Election so that the people of the UK can understand each party's vision for the new relationship with the EU and the world and elect a new Government to lead the negotiations to leave the EU.
